Reviews.Title: This phone packs a Powerful Punch
Reviews.Author: flyladyjax
Reviews.Content: The features are very high tech for a boost mobile phone.  It has 3g speed & I love the email feature.  I just push the email button and up pops my yahoo acct.  I don't even need a computer anymore to write read or send emails.  That is a wonderful feature to me.  Below are more impressive features that this phone packs:* Slide-out QWERTY Keypad* 2MP Camera with Digital Zoom & Video* 3G High-Speed Data* Wireless Web Email Access* Instant Messaging* Multi-Media & Text Messaging* MP3 Music Player* Stereo Bluetooth* GPS Enabled* Supports micro SD(tm) Card up to 16GB (card not included)* Voicemail, Caller ID, Call Waiting and Call Forwarding* Speakerphone with Voice Recognition* Downloadable Games, Wallpapers & Music Ringtones* 600 Entry Phonebook* Alarm Clock, Calendar, Calculator, To Do List, & Voice-Memo RecorderCONS:  The things that I do not like about this phone is the battery life, No apps, Not the greatest camera pixels, most pictures are blurry.  Still overall You will be impressedUPDATED: 04/22/11 I reduced this down to 3 stars because the battery life is just unreal.  It goes dead in less than 4 hours.  One night I took the fully charged phone off of the charger and put another phone on the charger to charge and before morning the phone was beeping and the red dead battery alert was beeping.  The battery life is awful.  I would not buy this phone again

Reviews.Title: Be careful... your CELL PHONE just might have other plans!
Reviews.Author: Please be nice to my package!
Reviews.Content: I am writing this review as a warning to OTHERS!  You see I ordered on 10 June13 this cell phone as a "Sprint SAMSUNG refurbished" RANT phone...  My way of thinking ===  WOW!  Great phone at a fraction of a "new Sprint SAMSUNG" RANT phone! ***And my daughter would just LOVE it (PURPLE).***  You realize that "EVERYTHING" gets computerized........ Well, that's where it ends!  We could go into WHAT IS A PURPLE RANT DOING VACATIONING(?) IN BROOKLYN?!  Oh,when is a PURPLE cell phone, NOT a Sprint?  I MAY HAVE ordered SPRINT, but I was told a "LG ANDROID" would do nicely...  Yes, a PURPLE cell phone...  But try convincing the SALESMAN(?) through FIFTEEN e-mails that he did NOT get my item correct.  Try to convince the SALESMAN that you can read a calendar... and a week is NOT the number of days that HE came up with!  AMAZON stepped in,  (good news!) I JUST got reimbursed.  I did not mention the name of the store,  BUT please... "BUYER BEWARE!"

Reviews.Title: Great phone!!
Reviews.Author: akmackinnon
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone and it has awesome features. The camera takes really good pictures. The slideout keyboard is really nice and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: bad item
Reviews.Author: Gabriela Amestoy "gabriela"
Reviews.Content: Seller took more than three weeks to send an item across three states. Never answered emails . Item that arrived was different than pictured or described. Phone was either stolen or not paid for it was unconnectable bad esn. Never an answer from seller.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone but not compatiable with company stated
Reviews.Author: Misslead
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone to get a Boost mobile account. As you can see clearly on the picture, the phone itself has the Boost mobile logo on it. No where in the Ad does it state that is not compatible with Boost mobile and/or that it is only compatible with Sprint. Completely mislead.The phone was shipped wrapped in paper towel, no box or information was included.Also, unable to track the item or verify seller information. Shaddy and disappointed.Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Slider Phone
Reviews.Author: John Delsanto
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone. It might be a little outdated but it still has a lot of great features. When my Iphone breaks, I find my good ole rant and turn it on and it is always good to go.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Evelyn M Ortega
Reviews.Content: Great phone for student. So far no problems. My Teen loves it and the color is perfect. great size too

Reviews.Title: disappointed
Reviews.Author: Tonya Richardson
Reviews.Content: The item didn't make phone call or accept them. The phone would ring and you could pick up the call but the speaker did not work at all

Reviews.Title: Yep, I can hear you fine.
Reviews.Author: BigDaddy5
Reviews.Content: The phone works great once activated to our plan. The phone arrived in great condition and looks semi-new. All buttons are functional and in great working condition. Highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Happy with purchase:)
Reviews.Author: Ninette1985
Reviews.Content: was shipped very promptly, Great phone, excellent service, Gps, social networking , email, etc, pretty much everything i needed access to with out spending money on a smart phone that takes up too much of my time!

Reviews.Title: Samsung Rant
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone and it has awesome features. The camera takes really good pictures. The slide out keyboard is really nice and easy to use it feels pretty solid but it is a lot smaller than I'm use to, it's cool and price was great, wish it had the owners manual, but you can't have everything  and it arrived pretty quickly.

Reviews.Title: Best basic phone.
Reviews.Author: Overdose
Reviews.Content: Had this phone for over a year, I drop it lot and still works perfect.  Best keyboard phone I ever used,  I like the slide keyboard(like this phone) then flip keyboard.  Best for the average text-er, Best phone to have if you don't feel like overpaying for a smartphone for unnecessary luxury and accessories.

Reviews.Title: not happy
Reviews.Author: Rita Wolfinger "HarleyDoll"
Reviews.Content: Im having problems with the phone alrdy. it wont stay charged enough for me to even turn the damn thing on

Reviews.Title: I hate to love this phone
Reviews.Author: PrimeOne
Reviews.Content: This phone is certainly pretty, but it has a few flaws. For some reason, when I start to text a lot of the time (using the slide out keyboard) it turns itself off. It may be that the phone needs a new battery, or I may have just got a lemon. Anyway, if this is common for the Samsung Rant, I would rather have my old flip phone back. :(

Reviews.Title: Sweet
Reviews.Author: Joseph A. Escher
Reviews.Content: Arrived on time and in perfect condition. Works even better then I'd hoped. Will definitely buy from this customer again.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: wydkau
Reviews.Content: i have myphone very fast and i did not have no trouble , looks  very good and responsible the perstore that send it from Houston

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: A_rose1021
Reviews.Content: Great phone only reason for 4 starts and not 5 is that it does not use a sim card like alot of the boost phonesN

Reviews.Title: Abysmal Customer Service
Reviews.Author: Columbus OH
Reviews.Content: I am a professional who recently purchased a Sanyo Juno phone to use as an extra special-purpose business phone. After using Boost cards to pay for the phone for two months I switched to the Auto Re-Boost Payment Service, wherein payments are automatically charged to my credit card each month. What a terrible mistake. Boost Mobile has been making monthly charges to my credit card at the same time that it has cut off my phone service, telling me that there is no money in my account. Of course, the latter cannot be true is the former is true. When I call Boost's service number to resolve the problem I learn that there are no human beings to speak to, only an automated list of options, none of which correspond to my problem. When I contact Boost via its online customer service (an e-mail option in which the customer is asked to describe his or her problem) I receive a phone call instructing me to call the service number, which, as I've just noted, provides no human operator and tells me that there is no money in my account. In other words, Boost Mobile tells me that to restore my service I must make another payment, even though that payment has already been made by their Auto Re-Boost plan. In effect, I must pay twice for each month of service and there is nothing I can do about it. Is this a company you would want to do business with? I deeply regret selecting to business with this company.

Reviews.Title: Boost Mobile Rant
Reviews.Author: Malcolm J
Reviews.Content: phone was in inpeckable better than new condition and shipment was extremely fast i am very satisfied with my phone and the seller very good deal A+++++++seller
